content: उपदा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To give in addition. {@--2@} To offer, give, grant (in general). {@--3@} To add. {@--4@} ({c1c} <ab>A.</ab>) (<ab>Ved.</ab>) ({%a%}) To take upon oneself. ({%b%}) To erect, raise, support.

उपदा {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> Giving a present. --दा (<ab>cf.</ab> <ls>P. III. 3. 106</ls>) {@--1@} A present, an offering to a king or a great man, a {%Nazarānā%}; उपदा विविशुः शश्वन्नोत्सेकाः कोसलेश्वरं <ls>R. 4. 70</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 41</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 30</ls>; <ls>P. V. 1. 47.</ls> {@--2@} A bribe.
